General.Name: Vitalhub Corp
General.Description: Vitalhub Corp., together with its subsidiaries, provides technology solutions for health and human service providers in Canada, the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, Western Asia, and internationally. Its solutions include electronic healthcare record, case management, care coordination and optimization, and patient flow, engagement, and operational visibility solutions  Vitalhub Corp. was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 480 University Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5G 1V2
